args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Simple statement: for any complex number z, the modulus of exp z equals exp of the real part.
-/-

theorem complex_abs_exp_eq_exp_re (z : Complex) : Complex.abs (Complex.exp z) = Real.exp (Complex.re z) := by
  sorry

args.query: mathlib4 complex.abs Complex.exp Real.exp complex.re mathlib4 theorem abs_exp_re

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Complex

/-- For any complex z, |exp z| = exp (re z). -/
theorem complex_abs_exp_eq_exp_re (z : ℂ) : Complex.abs (Complex.exp z) = Real.exp (Complex.re z) := by
  sorry
